item.title: D for Dissolve
item.description: Group D has dissolved due to members taking a break. I will work to try and find you all new homes if you'd like.

item.title: Groups C and D
item.description:
Titanium will be expanding to accommodate two new groups (Groups C and D). Group C is nearly filled, with D already formed. This will bring our member count to 32, with a few non-static members. There are no current plans to expand much more beyond this.

These two groups were acquiring from the GG free company - a nice group of people who I have been close to for some time. Groups A and B, please welcome our new members warmly.

item.title: Team B
item.description:
Titanium will be expanding to accommodate a second team (Team B). The team is fully filled, with all members holding onto a Team B linkpearl. These members will be brought into the FC over the next week.

Team B will be running on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 9:30PM Eastern time. Other times may be scheduled as needed.

The team composition is as follows: Fauxra Lauli Kigen Drakeon Auluras Seyo Kaoru Hiro
